verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil.<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> us, what <S%H6467>work<s%> you <S%H6466>did<s%> in their <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H3117>times<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>

How you did <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5193>planted<s%> them; how you did <S%H7489>afflict<s%> the <S%H3816>people,<s%> and <S%H7971>cast<s%> them out.

For they <S%H3423>got<s%> not the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%> by their own <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> them: but your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and your <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you had a <S%H7522>favor<s%> to them.
You are my <S%H4428>King,<s%> O <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3444>deliverances<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Through you will we <S%H5055>push<s%> down our <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> through your <S%H8034>name<s%> will we <S%H947>tread<s%> them under that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against us.
For I will not <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
But you have <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> and have put them to <S%H954>shame<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> us.
In <S%H430>God<s%> we <S%H1984>boast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long, and <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But you have <S%H2186>cast<s%> off, and put us to <S%H3637>shame;<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> not <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
You make us to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> from the <S%H6862>enemy:<s%> and they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> us <S%H8154>spoil<s%> for themselves.
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> appointed for <S%H3978>meat;<s%> and have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>
You <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H3808>nothing,<s%> <S%H1952><s%> and do not <S%H7235>increase<s%> your wealth by their <S%H4242>price.<s%>
You <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> a <S%H3933>scorn<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are <S%H5439>round<s%> about us.
You <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> a <S%H4493>shaking<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> among the <S%H3816>people.<s%>
My <S%H3639>confusion<s%> is <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me, and the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of my <S%H6440>face<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> me,
For the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> and <S%H1442>blasphemes;<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H5358>avenger.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> on us; yet have we not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have we dealt <S%H8266>falsely<s%> in your <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> neither have our <S%H838>steps<s%> <S%H5186>declined<s%> from your <S%H734>way;<s%>
<S%H3588>Though<s%> you have sore <S%H1794>broken<s%> us in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> us with the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> we have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> or <S%H6566>stretched<s%> out our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god;<s%>
Shall not <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> out? for he <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H3588>Yes,<s%> for your sake are we <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long; we are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter.<s%>
<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H3462>sleep<s%> you, O <S%H136>Lord?<s%> <S%H6974>arise,<s%> <S%H2186>cast<s%> us not off for <S%H5331>ever.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> you your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression?<s%>
For our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7743>bowed<s%> <S%H7743>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust:<s%> our <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise<s%> for our <S%H5833>help,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeem<s%> us for your <S%H2617>mercies'<s%> <S%H4616>sake.<s%>
